title: Binance dives into investigation of BOME insider trading claims
description: Binance, a leading cryptocurrency exchange, has initiated a comprehensive investigation. This follows allegations of insider trading related to the Solana-based meme coin, Book of Meme (BOME). The probe was triggered by the “BOME rat warehouse” incident, which raised questions within the crypto community. Binance aims to maintain transparency and fairness in the crypto market. The […]

title: Binance CEO Teng Foresees Bitcoin Surpassing $80,000 via ETF Inflows
description:
According to a Bloomberg report, Binance CEO Richard Teng has provided insights suggesting a potential surge in Bitcoin’s value. Teng predicts that Bitcoin could exceed the $80,000 mark, driven by inflows from Bitcoin exchange-traded funds (ETFs).
